## Source: amazon-inspector (fcebd381b163f06c896e93c9023d91db384265cd9da67f09ff1c85bd04ea70ed)
The package my-team-tools was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b2c60a47f7995236dee73795711aff2769155c5216e1f2391b6fe0adce4f8269)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'my-team-tools' @ 5.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
